name: Flora
description: Flora was born with a disease, and that has made her thin and frail, almost like a porcelain doll. She can only stay inside, but her magical hands create the most intricate dolls that almost look alive.

passiveSkill.name: Puppeteer
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Flora's HP Max in battle increases by {placeholder}; she splits into two units on her death.Puppet Nono receives {placeholder} ATK, {placeholder} DEF, and {placeholder} HP.Flora receives {placeholder} ATK, {placeholder} DEF, and {placeholder} HP."}

uniqueSkill.name: Puppet Stab
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Light the liar's pants on fire! Flora attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage."}

specialSkill.name: Puppet String
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Bad guys must die! Flora attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, reducing the target's DEF by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Puppet Control
normalSkill.description: Flora and the puppet work together to fire a cog. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Light the liar's pants on fire! Flora attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
